A plan, passed down for 500 years like kindling, finally came to fruition &mdash; and at last, all the sacrifices that had been made bore their finest reward.<br>In Natlan, a nation flowing with memories, an indelible impression of that moment was etched into obsidian.<br>Relive this battle through recollection, and perhaps you may gain new insights...|Reflection: The Deep, Transient Void}}
'''Stone Stele Records''' is a [[Trounce Domain]] unlocked during the {{Quest|When All Becomes a Monument}}. Players can relive their battle with the [[Lord of Eroded Primal Fire]] and obtain rewards.

==Enemies==
{{Card|Lord of Eroded Primal Fire|type=Enemy|caption=1}}

==Rules==
{{Transclude|Domain|trouncerule|section=1}}

==Ley Line Disorder==
* Some of its attacks can cause stackable Attrition that, after a time, will cause your active character to lose HP. During combat, it will grant itself a Void Ward. At this time, use a certain number of elemental attacks to break the Ward, which will cause it to enter a confused state. Nightsoul-aligned elemental attacks will break the Ward more effectively.
